headline: Citizens Financial Group, Inc. Declares Dividends on Preferred Stock
summary: PROVIDENCE, R.I., May 01, 2025--Citizens Financial Group, Inc. (NYSE: CFG) announced that its board of directors has declared the following dividends on its preferred stock payable on July 7, 2025, to preferred shareholders of record at the close of business on June 20, 2025:
